body_html:
@gunan Any thoughts on why the pip package would be broken here?

AFAIK, the PyPi packages have some platform-specific build settings, which may mean that you'll have to build from source. Did you try an Ubuntu-targeting container, too?

@gunan Any thoughts on why the pip package would be broken here?

AFAIK, the PyPi packages have some platform-specific build settings, which may mean that you'll have to build from source. Did you try an Ubuntu-targeting container, too?
